HomePage.profession: I'm a developer driven by passion, proudly representing Brazil.
HomePage.whySimpleTitle: Simple code and design just works.
HomePage.whySimpleDesc: It's easy to read, understand, and maintain. It is less error-prone and easier to fix. It is more maintainable and extensible.
HomePage.yetStunningDesc: Simple can be stunning. It can be beautiful, elegant, and efficient. It can be simple and stunning at the same time.
HomePage.insideAndOutExplDesc: Simple and stunning code and design. Simple and stunning inside and out. That's what I aim for in everything I do.
HomePage.quality1desc: Communication is key to ensure that everyone is on the same page and that the project is going in the right direction.
HomePage.quality2desc: An essential quality for a software engineer, as it ensures that the code is clean and efficient.
HomePage.quality3desc: Paying attention to details is crucial to ensure that the code is clean and efficient.

Footer.aboutPhrase: What's up! My name is Augusto. Also known as munraitoo13, I'm a passionate software engineer from Brazil.
